TopicTitle: What the heck happened to spannermonkey's mods?

Articles.Content:
Does anyone have a download for all of spannermonkey's mods? They look REALLY cool, But none of the downloads can be found.

Can anyone tell me what happened?
Are there any examples that you could give?
I mean, i don't know. One day they are there, the other day the links just dissapear..
Is there a particular mod that you looked for and can't find?
Two, actually. SM Armory, and SM Marine.

There are some updates from October on his profile explaining the situation:

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/&status=8953&type=status

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/50907-spannermonkeysmce/&status=8961&type=status

To sum up, it sounds like parts of those mods broke and needed big updates, and he took them down until he had time to fix them, which has not happened yet.

Ah. I get it. So they will be back up soon!

I guess i have to wait, but thats ok! Just like i am for ksp 2
